org.osmdroid.mapsforge

Class MapsForgeTileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.tilesource.BitmapTileSourceBase
      • org.osmdroid.mapsforge.MapsForgeTileSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITileSource

    public class MapsForgeTileSource
extends BitmapTileSourceBase
    Adapted from code from here: https://github.com/MKergall/osmbonuspack, which is LGPL http://www.salidasoftware.com/how-to-render-mapsforge-tiles-in-osmdroid/

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapsForgeTileSource

        protected MapsForgeTileSource(String cacheTileSourceName,
                              int minZoom,
                              int maxZoom,
                              int tileSizePixels,
                              File[] file,
                              XmlRenderTheme xmlRenderTheme,
                              MultiMapDataStore.DataPolicy dataPolicy)
        The reason this constructor is protected is because all parameters, except file should be determined from the archive file. Therefore a factory method is necessary.
        Parameters:
        minZoom -
        maxZoom -
        tileSizePixels -
        file -
        xmlRenderTheme - the theme to render tiles with

    • Method Detail

      • createFromFiles

        public static MapsForgeTileSource createFromFiles(File[] file)
        Creates a new MapsForgeTileSource from file.

        Parameters minZoom and maxZoom are obtained from the database. If they cannot be obtained from the DB, the default values as defined by this class are used, which is zoom = 3-20
        Parameters:
        file -
        Returns:
        the tile source

      • createFromFiles

        public static MapsForgeTileSource createFromFiles(File[] file,
                                                  XmlRenderTheme theme,
                                                  String themeName)
        Creates a new MapsForgeTileSource from file[].

        Parameters minZoom and maxZoom are obtained from the database. If they cannot be obtained from the DB, the default values as defined by this class are used, which is zoom = 3-20
        Parameters:
        file -
        theme - this can be null, in which case the default them will be used
        themeName - when using a custom theme, this sets up the osmdroid caching correctly
        Returns:

      • createFromFiles

        public static MapsForgeTileSource createFromFiles(File[] file,
                                                  XmlRenderTheme theme,
                                                  String themeName,
                                                  MultiMapDataStore.DataPolicy dataPolicy)
        Creates a new MapsForgeTileSource from file[].

        Parameters minZoom and maxZoom are obtained from the database. If they cannot be obtained from the DB, the default values as defined by this class are used, which is zoom = 3-20
        Parameters:
        file -
        theme - this can be null, in which case the default them will be used
        themeName - when using a custom theme, this sets up the osmdroid caching correctly
        dataPolicy - use this to override the default, which is "RETURN_ALL"
        Returns:

      • renderTile

        public Drawable renderTile(MapTile pTile)

        public static void createInstance(Application app)
